name: Dance Is Cast
description:
Description : 

         In Dance Is Cast, you play the character of Michael whose dream is to become the king of Pop Music. As you go through different disco stages, each more inflamed than the next, you will have to follow the right paths in order to climb onto the “Disco Throne”. Some boxes having been drawn, you will have to use your memory and your dancing skills to follow the beats of the music at the risk of spraining your ankle. The dance is cast...

Rules : You must move to the squares adjacent to your player when the mirror ball expands.

Game : Musical / Fun / Chance / Memory

Keys : Z - Front / Q - Left / S - Bottom / D - Right / Esc - Pause Menu / Slider -  Music
